2025.title: Developed portfolio website
2025.description: Created a personal portfolio website to showcase my projects, research, and professional achievements in AI and machine learning.

2025.title: Completed CFO-II Conversational Agent for Financial Analysis
2025.description: Successfully developed CFO-II, a multimodal voice-to-voice conversational agent designed for advanced financial analysis.

2024.title: Earned multiple AI certifications
2024.description: Achieved certifications in Retrieval Augmented Generation for Production with LangChain & LlamaIndex by Activeloop, Training and Fine-tuning LLMs for Production by Activeloop, LlamaIndex and Intel, and LangGraph by LangChain Academy.

2024.title: Started developing CFO-II for financial analysis
2024.description: Began the development of CFO-II, a multimodal voice-to-voice financial analysis agent, in late December.

2023.title: Joined GC Faisalabad for B.Ed
2023.description: Pursued a Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) to focus on leveraging AI for enhancing student learning and advancing educational experiences.

2023.title: Promoted to Lead Machine Learning Engineer at Idrak AI Ltd.
2023.description: Took on a leadership role to oversee a team of 7 ML engineers and drive scalable AI projects, including generative agents and advanced ASR/TTS systems.

2022.title: Started working at Idrak AI Ltd. as a Machine Learning Engineer
2022.description: Focused on fine-tuning ASR and TTS models, training LLMs, and building AI solutions for speech and NLP tasks.

2021.title: Started working at Safebeat Rx as a Machine Learning Engineer
2021.description: Contributed to developing real-time ECG monitoring systems and applied deep learning for signal classification and analysis.

2021.title: Graduated with a Master’s degree in Computer Science
2021.description: Completed my MS with a focus on AI, Advanced AI, and Evolutionary Computing, completing a thesis on pneumonia detection using hybrid deep learning.

2020.title: Started working at ML Trade as a Machine Learning Developer
2020.description: Developed AI-driven trading systems, including chart-based image classification models for predicting trade types and directions.

2020.title: Left the Government of Punjab Education Department
2020.description: Transitioned from my role as a Secondary School Teacher to focus on AI and machine learning roles in the private sector.

2019.title: Earned key certifications in AI and research
2019.description: Completed certifications in Machine Learning by Stanford Online, Research Methods by University of London, and IBM Watson AI by IBM.

2018.title: Started working at the Government of Punjab Education Department
2018.description: Joined as a Secondary School Teacher, teaching Computer Science and inspiring young learners.

2017.title: Started working at the University of Sargodha as a Visiting Lecturer
2017.description: Taught courses like Data Structures, Programming Fundamentals, and supervised student projects.

2017.title: Graduated with a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology
2017.description: Completed my BS IT with a focus on Image Processing and Machine Learning, working on a final year project in sign language recognition.

2015.title: Won a programming competition
